scripts.wasm:bundler: wasm-pack build --target bundler --weak-refs --release --out-dir dist && rm -rf dist/.gitignore dist/README.md dist/package.json
scripts.wasm:lite: wasm-pack build --target bundler --weak-refs --release --out-dir dist/lite --no-default-features && rm -rf dist/lite/.gitignore dist/lite/README.md dist/lite/package.json
